name: NotonTab
description:
A lightweight Chrome extension that remembers data per tab and domain. Store notes, temporary inputs, or states specific to each open tab or website, without needing a server. Useful for researchers, developers, and power users who want contextual memory while browsing.

Key Features:
• Automatically captures and stores data based on tab or domain.
• Isolated storage per site or tab session.
• Instant access to notes or saved info per site.
• Fully client-side, no login or server required.
